DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the subjective assessments of an investigational lubricant eye drop.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of the Daytime Use of an Investigational Lubricant Eye Drop
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of dry eye Current use of Refresh Liquigel, GenTeal Gel Drops or Refresh Celluvisc at least twice daily Must not have worn contact lenses within 7 days preceding enrollment Must not have had punctal plugs inserted within 30 days preceding enrollment
